summary:
RGS comes with two presets
see description for more
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/hotfilebannerlo7tiqwprc.png[/img]

[code]<sharpen on/of>
#define USE_LUMASHARPEN 1 //[LumaSharpen] //-LumaSharpen : Sharpens the image. ( off set it to 0)

<smaa on/off>
#define USE_SMAA 0 //[SMAAWrap] //-SMAA Anti-aliasing : Smoothens jagged lines using the SMAA technique. ( on set it to 1)

<Border on/off>
#define USE_BORDER 0 //[Shared] //-Border : Can be used to create letterbox borders around the image.

<this settings in CustomFX.cfg for performence boost

<Gauss on/off
#define USE_GAUSS 1 //[Gaussian] //-Gaussian Blur / Bloom / Unsharpmask ( you need fps set it to 0 )

<this settings in McFX.cfg>
<#define USE_DEPTHOFFIELD 0 //[DOF] //- ( set it to 1 for using DOF>[/code]
author: BlackRaven90
